comment.author: 8777250@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage PSA (Pacific Southwest Airlines) 1949-1988, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 41424429@N08
comment._content: This is actually a Lockheed L-1011 not a Boeing 727. PSA operated a few of the L-1011's complete with a downstairs lounge (figuring that there wasn't a lot of baggage being carried between Los Angeles and San Francisco), but it wasn't profitable and the planes were taken out of service.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 8777250@N03
comment._content: I remember seeing PSA's L-1011's back in '74 when my grandparents had a view from their apartment of all of the southern terminals at LAX!
